title: intel hd 520 at 144hz
body:
i bought a laptop(waiting for it to arrive) with i7-6600u cpu intergrated intel hd 520 graphics and 16gb ddr4 ram. I want to buy an external 1080p monitor but i am not sure if it is worth buying a 144hz or a 60hz one. Do you think that intel hd 520 will manage to play league over 60 fps(even in medium or low settings)? 

Thanks for your time!

replies.body:
It's possible that the HD 520 graphics will run League at 144Hz, but for almost any other game, it will be hard to maintain that framerate on integrated graphics. I think a 60Hz display would make far more sense on a laptop without a dedicated graphics card.

Let me know if you have any questions.
